general_info.title: üõ†Ô∏è  General Information About the Help System
general_info.short: How to use the help system.
general_info.long:
This help system is designed to provide information about the pyWGgen project.
  You can search for information by selecting menu items or entering keywords.
  The information is structured into sections, with both brief summaries and detailed descriptions available for each.
  To exit the help system, press 'q' or type 'exit'.

search_help.title: üîç  Searching the Help System
search_help.short: How to search for information in the help system.
search_help.long:
To search for information, you can enter keywords.
  The system will suggest options matching your query.
  Search examples: type 'Gradio' to learn about the interface, or type 'error' to see troubleshooting tips.
  The system considers both section titles and their content.
